building: Manggahan Elementary School - Building No. 1
location: Diamond St, Sunshine Village, Brgy. Manggahan
risk mitigation actions: Ensure proper maintenance of the building's electrical, plumbing, and heating/cooling systems to prevent accidents and system failures
Install pumps or water to provide water supply on higher floor levels
Consult with a structural engineer to check on spalling of structure elements, design elements or conduct repairs
Apply appropriate repair materials, such as epoxy-based or polymer-modified cementitious repair mortars, to restore the surface and prevent further spallin
